settings.title: Explore smart sound features for great audio, personalized listening, and easy control.
Powerful Chip Drawing
settings.description: The chip swiftly adapts audio using advanced algorithms, tuning sound in real time for your ear shape to deliver precise, high-fidelity sound.

settings.title: Personalized Listening
settings.description: Experience sound tailored to your individual preferences for a truly personalized listening journey, with every detail fine-tuned for maximum immersion.

settings.title: Active Noise Cancellation
settings.description: Noise-cancelling microphones and a rear vent are strategically placed to detect and counter noise before it reaches your ear.

settings.title: Touch To Control
settings.description: Touch control on the stem lets you adjust volume, play/pause music, mute/unmute calls, end calls, and switch between listening modes.

settings.title: Ergonomically designed for all-day comfort, ensuring a secure, comfortable fit for extended wear.

items.title: Sharp Call Clarity
items.description: Voice Isolation minimizes background noise and enhances your voice clarity, ensuring you're easily heard in loud or windy environments.

items.title: Always-on Intelligent Assistant
items.description: Control audio, get directions, and receive notifications with Siri. Use head gestures to manage calls, messages, and alerts with ease.

items.title: Personalized Spatial Audio
items.description: Personalized Spatial Audio brings you 3D sound suited to your specific ear shape for a theater-like experience that surrounds you with sound.

items.title: Active Noise Cancellation
items.description: A driver and acoustic algorithms enhance noise cancellation, giving you control over sounds for better focus or immersive listening.

items.title: Calibrates Music to Your Ears
items.description: Adaptive technology calibrates music to your ears, adjusting frequencies in real-time for a personalized and immersive listening experience.

items.title: Connecting Is Simple
items.description: AirPods provide a seamless experience with one-tap setup, automatic switching and audio sharing for effortless use across devices.

settings.title: Unmatched design—superior performance and customer satisfaction in one.

tabs.tab_title: Are AirPods compatible with all Apple devices?
tabs.tab_content: AirPods provide up to 3-5 hours of listening time on a single charge. With the charging case, you can extend this to up to 10 hours of total listening time. For talk time, they offer up to 3 hours on a single charge, and up to 18 hours with the case. Charging is quick, with just 15 minutes in the case providing around 3 hours of listening time.
